title: Committees
content:
## Functions Howdy! We are Michael and Braylee, and we are thrilled to be your FUNctions Co-Chairs! Our committee brings the FUN to FEAST events such as holiday socials and formals. Watch out class of 2026, the party planning people are ready to have a great year!
![](/images/uploads/tmp-13-.jpg)
## Fundraising Howdy! We are Kiley and Luke, together the two of us are the Fundraising committee! Our main priorities are planning profit shares, arranging valunteers for an annual 5K, and running comittee olympics! We are so excited to meet the class of 2026 and make fun memories planning events and hanging out at committee meetings!
![](/images/uploads/tmp-12-.jpg)
## Promo What’s up guys it’s Kiran and Abby, your promo co-chairs and the best people on Earth.  We are excited to meet all of the freshmen and deliver the upmost drippiness to our members.  Last year promo had two merch drops and we are planning for the same if not more… and drippier. With that being said, we will leave you with a quote from a famous prophet, Dominique Jones, aka Lil Baby: “Drip or drown, but we know how to swim.” 
![](/images/uploads/tmp-10-.jpg)
## Service League Howdy! Our names are Sydney and Gabe and we are the Co-Chairs for Service League (A.K.A. Sleag)! Sleag is responsible for the service and philanthropy side of FEAST, which means we organize monthly service opportunities, street cleanups at our adopted stretch of University Drive, and a service retreat during winter break. We are excited to meet the Fightin' Texas Aggie Class of 2026 and together make an impact on the city of College Station through service events!
![](/images/uploads/tmp-9-.jpg)
## Leadership Howdy! We are the leadership committee. Our names are Ethan and Izzy, but more importantly we are the loudest and the proudest members of the Fightin Texas Aggie class of 2024 A-A-A-A-A! Our committee is mostly in charge of events such as our fall and spring retreat along with organizing Shackathon for FEAST. If you are looking for a fun committee, definitely look out for Leadership!
![](/images/uploads/tmp-7-.jpg)
## 12th Man Howdy Army! Our names are Lauren and Courtland, and we are the 12th Man Co-Chairs! We are so excited to plan monthly good bull nights, pick the game of week, and put on a sick tailgate. If you join 12th Man, be prepared to be in the most legendary and spirited committee ever. We can't wait to meet you Class of 2026, and let's get this year started!
![](/images/uploads/tmp-9-.jpg)
## Outreach
![](/images/uploads/tmp-11-.jpg)
